title: I'm going to host a Tournament for my club members.
body:
On Saturday/Sunday.
I getting My helping others Improve members to participate in a 3/5 Round tourney.
With me, Ace/Stark as "Casters"
The winning team gets 10$ RP each (As that's all I can afford)
I'll record it, and upload it to YouTube.

The World series just ended.
So, 

I PRESENT TO YOU!

THE UNDERWORLD SERIES! XD

EDIT: Because I'm silly.
On Saturday, Sunday when ever everyone ready is when it will begin.
Only those in the Helping Others Improve club, will be participating.
But, since Stark and Ace act as Additional coaches and help me/The other members out.
They wont participate, as it will be an unfair advantage to who ever gets them.

The team leaders, Which atm seems to be Yasho VS Fitz or Jonius (Still confirming the second captain)
Captains will pick members form the club, one at a time, (Those who said yes)
Until two teams of 5 are made.

We will then go into a custom game, and begin Draft Matches.
I haven't decided if it will be best out of 3 or 5.
Probably 3 to save time.

Winners of Team A or B gets $10 RP each.

replies.body:
Hey is this tournament going to be online or live in person?

We can definitely help a little bit with prizes have you seen this awesome guide?  - http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-events/5VfpQ1pe-guide-how-to-organise-your-first-online-or-live-tournament

Oh sweet, some prizes would be awesome.

I'm reading the link as I'm typing:
Into:
Who is it for-
My club members form Helping Others Improve!
Its just something fun for them to be apart of, that and testing my abilities as a commentator.
Achieving- 
For the members to gain experience in team work, and what its like being apart of something like a tournament.
Time-
So far, Sunday Afternoon. In 6 days.
Why?-
Got the idea after "Worlds" ended. Me and the other club members were talking and watching it at the same time.
And thought, "huh, this is the best pros VS even more best Pros. I wonder what it would be like if non-pros low silver/bronze summoners did this?"
Had the idea of it being the complete opposite of worlds. calling it "The UnderWorlds".

So far its only two teams, I don't have many club members its a very short tourney I guess.
Unless I decide to add in Solo 1 V 1's.

When- Sunday(Ish)
Who-
Team A Captain - Fitzky
Team B Captain - Yasho

Members participating.
Jonius7
MECHANICS
Negasonic
Eleftheria
Miicka
Visuals -MAYBE NOT CONFIRMED
Chobi
Qube
CHEESYLEEKS (If some members don't want to participate)

Other members who have not said anything:
Hornetnest
R0rscharch
XxdatpoisenxX

Tomorrow sometime, Fitz and Yasho will start picking members for there team.
They will then have about 4-5 days to practice.

Casters/Helpers
Myslef- Yasei Doubursu
RonyStark- Additional helper / coach for the club
Gordons Coming - He's the one going to stream it all. (Not sure tho atm) 
Could use help on that.

Rules:
Draft Mode- They will get bans and Picks.
5 v 5 on Summoners Rift.


This will be  done online, as I'm sure no one in the club can afford a trip. (I certainly can't)

--------------------

Hopefully Gordon's going to be streaming it live.
I'll do recordings on my end, I'll try and get Stark to do the same to have different perspectives.
I'm sure Fitz will record his side too.

Anything you can do to help Marauder will be great.
So far the only prize is $10 RP each (50 in total) But hay, if you can help with second prizes 'N stuff that would be awesome.

You need to submit your event information (I recommend checking out the FAQ first) through the events tool.

It can be found here: http://events.oce.leagueoflegends.com/content/faq

Sounds like a cool thing you are creating :)

Uhh, I filled it in.
But it wouldn't let me submit?

Also, I only have enough club members for two teams, but the minimum is 4.
Is this still ok?

Oh ok whoops.
Still new to this.

brb hang on while I figure this out.

Sounds cool! So could you give us a little more detail into how this is gonna work?
So your getting everyone from Helping Others Improve as well as anyone else who wants to participate?
Does everyone have to get together and sought out teams then apply?
And finally, I have no idea what a "3/5 round tourney" is mind explaining it to me XD
3/5 round tourney I'm pretty sure is when it's first to 3 wins like they do for worlds and stuffs, just don't quote me on that :P
Yes thank you I pretty much had everything explained to me :)

**Teams**

**Team A**
Fitzky (captain)
Miicka
Qube
MECHANICS
Chobi

**Team B**
Yasho (captain)
Eleftheria
Jonius7
CHEESYLEEKS
~~Negasonic~~ 

**Subs**
Hornetnest

XxdatpoisenxX

**Casters**
Yasei Doubutsu
RonyStark
Ace
Hi, I know I'm not in your club, but can I potentially join your club and join the tournament please! This would be a great experience for me.

The two teams have already been formed, but you can still join the club.
The original purpose of the club (This is something fun where just doing)
Is to be spectated by one of the three coaches, the two are helpers.

But I mainly do stuff like this
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC8x_OF9Fo1vb8NkaASrXaXQ

will add later.

Heyy, slightly off topic, I wouldn't mind joining your club, it seems to be a great community! Any free spots?

Cheers,

~Ral

no, not really?
Its mainly for people who are bronze and is looking to improve and get better.
Its already got 3 Gold+ members who act as free coaches.

:(

Sorry.
my internets pretty stable i live in sydney close to the city so my connections pretty good plus my OBS Settings are good for league streams use to stream plus i get viewers on my channel :D
Whats your twitch link?

lol #Bragging
Fuckign wish I could stream.

We still got about 4-5 days before this happens.
We got time to prepare.
No worries Add me on League and PM me if you want hopefully riot can give an early christmas gifts for the winners *cough cough, Tournament Ryze *

lol

I doubt it, I could ask Marauder tho.
Tis a joke but would be super awesome if they did,
No harm in asking.
:( RIP would love to do a tournament/ scrim i could stream for you guys but i would rely on me 100% i could stream, while i mute myself on teamspeak or whatever app and spectate what you guys see ?

That actually sounds like a fair deal, you cant play.
But you could stream for us.
Starks laptop cant handle it, even tho he can stream.
My computer has the capacity to stream, but my uploads are atrocious. 

Will think about this.

Firstly, Yasei Doubutsu, well done!.

Secondly, to all those participating, examples such as this are witnessed well by those who need to see things at grass roots.

Finally, post the video feed so I can watch it live! (alive/duties permitting). After all, recording it is a great idea to post, but you would be surprised to know (maybe not?) that many people would be hungry for an event such as this, do allow them close enough to see it live.

I strongly urge you (Yasei Doubutsu, name?) and the people participating to have a great time in the competition and to take the event seriously.

Lets turn Bilgewater (oce) into a thriving port metropolis, filled with courageous and honourable pirates (the cheeky having fun part comes naturally but not the other).

Good Games for all!, now!, with more to come!.

Regards.

Void Escapee, aka Simon Lutze.

I don't have the means to stream, so hopefully either Ace or Stark does.

All I can do is record and then take 4 years to upload.

That sucks, I have a computer that can stream, but I live in a rural town with fuck all speed.
Takes me 3-4 hours to upload one of my vids.
im a sup main doubt nami/ thresh do damage :( i could use my smurf with no runes

Your knowledge is whats gonna upset the balance.
You'll know how to ward, roam, land abilities.
That's what I meant as an unfair advantage sorry.
i dont want any RP nor do i care but is it possible i could join?
No sorry, who ever would have you will have an Unfair advantage.
If there is still a free spot, sign me up. I can play pretty much everything except support
Yes.

aww maaann.. I want that elusive RP {{champion:32}} =D

Good luck to everyone participating. We will be rooting for you.
